options.content:
# Anleitung zur Podcast-Suche

## Es gibt zwei Möglichkeiten, um nach einem Podcast zu suchen:

### Option 1:
Wählen Sie zuerst den gewünschten Bereich über das Dropdown-Menü "Bereich" aus. Anschließend wählen Sie über das dazugehörige Dropdown-Menü "Podcast" den gewünschten Podcast aus. Soll diese Option verwendet werden, muss der Wert im Dropdown-Menü "AllePodcasts" auf "None" gesetzt werden.

### Option 2:
Verwenden Sie das Dropdown-Menü "AllePodcasts". In diesem Menü finden Sie alle von uns geführten Podcasts. Soll diese Option nicht verwendet werden, muss der Wert auf "None" gesetzt werden.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('$Podcast_title'))), '$Podcast_title'), 
FROM(
SELECT '$Podcast_title' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST($filled_size_headline_small - CHAR_LENGTH('Quellen: Apps'),0)), 'Quellen: Apps')
FROM(
SELECT 'Quellen: Apps' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

WITH broadcastids AS (
    SELECT CAST(broadcast_id.list[0][0] AS STRING) AS broadcast_id
    FROM Piano.podcast_profiles
    WHERE branding = "$Bereich" 
    ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC
),
all_titles_platforms AS(
SELECT 
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped` AS podcast_platform
INNER JOIN broadcastids ON podcast_platform.broadcast_id = broadcastids.broadcast_id
WHERE date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")),
not_all_titles_platforms AS(
    SELECT
  sum(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE
broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
)
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", ".")) FROM 
(
SELECT summe FROM ${dataset}
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(ROUND(summe,0) as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
  SELECT
  SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(m_zugriffe_1),COUNT(DISTINCT headline)) as summe,
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE
branding = "$Bereich"
AND
CASE """${Podcast:text}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE  broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding" END
AND headline != "All headlines"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
AND publication_date_1 BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))

WITH broadcastids AS (
    SELECT CAST(broadcast_id.list[0][0] AS STRING) AS broadcast_id
    FROM Piano.podcast_profiles
    WHERE branding = "$Bereich" 
    ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC
),
all_titles_platforms AS(
SELECT 
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, 
    platform
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped` as podcast_platform
INNER JOIN broadcastids ON podcast_platform.broadcast_id = broadcastids.broadcast_id
WHERE date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY platform),
not_all_titles_platforms AS(
    SELECT
  sum(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, platform
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE
broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
group by platform
)
SELECT * FROM ${dataset}

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH('ARD Audiothek')), 'ARD Audiothek')
FROM(
SELECT 'ARD Audiothek' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH('Spotify')), 'Spotify')
FROM(
SELECT 'Spotify' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST(0,$filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH('Apple Podcasts'))), 'Apple Podcasts')
FROM(
SELECT 'Apple Podcasts' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

WITH broadcastids AS (
    SELECT CAST(broadcast_id.list[0][0] AS STRING) AS broadcast_id
    FROM Piano.podcast_profiles
    WHERE branding = "$Bereich" 
    ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC
),
all_titles_platforms AS(
SELECT 
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, 
    platform
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped` AS podcast_platform
INNER JOIN broadcastids ON podcast_platform.broadcast_id = broadcastids.broadcast_id
WHERE platform = "ARD Audiothek" AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY platform),
not_all_titles_platforms AS(
    SELECT
  sum(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, platform
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE
broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
AND platform = "ARD Audiothek" AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
group by platform
)
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", ".")) FROM 
(
SELECT summe FROM ${dataset}
)

WITH broadcastids AS (
    SELECT CAST(broadcast_id.list[0][0] AS STRING) AS broadcast_id
    FROM Piano.podcast_profiles
    WHERE branding = "$Bereich" 
    ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC
),
all_titles_platforms AS(
SELECT 
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, 
    platform
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped`
INNER JOIN broadcastids ON `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped`.broadcast_id = broadcastids.broadcast_id
WHERE platform = "Spotify" AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY platform),
not_all_titles_platforms AS(
    SELECT
  sum(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, platform
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE
broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
AND platform = "Spotify" AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
group by platform
)
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", ".")) FROM 
(
SELECT summe FROM ${dataset}
)

WITH broadcastids AS (
    SELECT CAST(broadcast_id.list[0][0] AS STRING) AS broadcast_id
    FROM Piano.podcast_profiles
    WHERE branding = "$Bereich" 
    ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC
),
all_titles_platforms AS(
SELECT 
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, 
    platform
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped`
INNER JOIN broadcastids ON `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped`.broadcast_id = broadcastids.broadcast_id
WHERE platform = "Apple Podcasts" AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY platform),
not_all_titles_platforms AS(
    SELECT
  sum(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, platform
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE
broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
AND platform = "Apple Podcasts" AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
group by platform
)
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", ".")) FROM 
(
SELECT summe FROM ${dataset}
)

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST($filled_size_headline_small - CHAR_LENGTH('Bereich: $Bereich'),0)), 'Bereich: $Bereich')
FROM(
SELECT 'Bereich: $Bereich' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", GREATEST($filled_size_headline_small - CHAR_LENGTH('Ausgewählte Episoden'),0)), 'Ausgewählte Episoden')
FROM(
SELECT 'Ausgewählte Episoden' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

options.content: Podcast-Daten werden erst mit 5 Tagen Verzögerung zur Verfügung gestellt. Die freie Datumsauswahl oder Verwendung fester Zeiträume (bspw. „letzte 7 Tage“ oder „letzte 30 Tage“) beziehen sich deswegen hier auf die letzten verfügbaren 7 bzw. 30 Tage.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  post_video_view_time
FROM facebookinsightsownposts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE
branding = "$Bereich"
AND headline != "All headlines"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT
  SUM(m_technische_nutzer) AS summe
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE
branding = "$Bereich"
AND headline != "All headlines"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(summe as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
SELECT 
  SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE 
branding = "$Bereich" 
AND CASE """${Podcast:text}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE  broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding" END
AND CASE """${Podcast:text}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE REPLACE(headline,"'","") IN UNNEST(ARRAY_CONCAT(ARRAY[$Episode], ARRAY['None'])) END
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_big - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(ROUND(summe,0) as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(summe) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", "."))FROM
(
  SELECT 
  SAFE_DIVIDE(SUM(m_zugriffe_1),COUNT(DISTINCT headline)) as summe 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE 
branding = "$Bereich" 
AND CASE """${Podcast:text}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE  broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding" END
AND CASE """${Podcast:text}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE REPLACE(headline,"'","") IN UNNEST(ARRAY_CONCAT(ARRAY[$Episode], ARRAY['None'])) END
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))

WITH broadcastids AS (
    SELECT CAST(broadcast_id.list[0][0] AS STRING) AS broadcast_id
    FROM Piano.podcast_profiles
    WHERE branding = "$Bereich" 
    ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC
),
all_titles_platforms AS(
SELECT 
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, 
    platform,
    date
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped` as podcast_platform
INNER JOIN broadcastids ON podcast_platform.broadcast_id = broadcastids.broadcast_id
WHERE date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY platform, date),
not_all_titles_platforms AS(
    SELECT
  sum(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, platform,
  date
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE
broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
group by platform, date
),
ard_data AS (
  SELECT summe, date FROM 
  ${dataset}
  WHERE platform = "ARD Audiothek"
),
apple_data AS
(
    SELECT summe, date FROM 
  ${dataset}
  WHERE platform = "Apple Podcasts"
),
spotify_data AS
(
  SELECT summe as summe, date FROM 
  ${dataset}
  WHERE platform = "Spotify"
),
rest AS(
  SELECT SUM(summe) as summe, date FROM 
  ${dataset}
  WHERE platform != "ARD Audiothek" AND platform != "Apple Podcasts" AND platform != "Spotify"
  GROUP BY date
)
SELECT
  ${dataset}.date,
  ard_data.summe as ard_summe, 
  apple_data.summe as apple_summe, 
  spotify_data.summe as spotify_summe,
  rest.summe as rest_summe,
  COALESCE(ard_data.summe,0) + COALESCE(apple_data.summe, 0) + COALESCE(spotify_data.summe,0) + COALESCE(rest.summe,0) as zugriffe,
  "${type}" as type,
  DATE_DIFF(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"),DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin"),DAY) + 1 as timeRange
FROM ${dataset}
LEFT JOIN ard_data ON ${dataset}.date = ard_data.date
LEFT JOIN apple_data ON ${dataset}.date = apple_data.date
LEFT JOIN spotify_data ON ${dataset}.date = spotify_data.date
LEFT JOIN rest ON ${dataset}.date = rest.date
GROUP BY ${dataset}.date, ard_data.summe, apple_data.summe, spotify_data.summe, rest.summe
ORDER by date ASC

SELECT
  headline,
  SUM(zugriffe) as zugriffe,
FROM (
  SELECT
    FIRST_VALUE(publication_date_1) OVER (PARTITION BY headline ORDER BY publication_date_1 DESC) AS publication_date_2,
    REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') as podcast_title,
      broadcast_id,
    headline,
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS zugriffe,
    SUM(m_technische_nutzer) AS technische_nutzer,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE branding = "$Bereich"
AND CASE """${Podcast}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN True
ELSE REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') = """$Podcast""" END
AND  headline != "All headlines" 
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
  GROUP BY
    publication_date_1,
    podcast_title,
    headline,
      broadcast_id
  ORDER BY
    zugriffe DESC )
GROUP BY
  publication_date_2,
  podcast_title,
  headline, 
  broadcast_id

ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 3

SELECT
  publication_date_2,
  podcast_title,
    broadcast_id,
  headline,
  SUM(zugriffe) as zugriffe,
  SUM(technische_nutzer)
FROM (
  SELECT
    FIRST_VALUE(publication_date_1) OVER (PARTITION BY headline ORDER BY publication_date_1 DESC) AS publication_date_2,
    REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') AS podcast_title,
      broadcast_id,
    headline,
    SUM(m_zugriffe_1) AS zugriffe,
    SUM(m_technische_nutzer) AS technische_nutzer,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE branding = "$Bereich"
AND  CASE "$Podcast"
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') = """$Podcast""" END
AND CASE "${Podcast:text}"
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE REPLACE(headline,"'","") IN UNNEST(ARRAY_CONCAT(ARRAY[$Episode], ARRAY['None'])) END
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
  GROUP BY
    publication_date_1,
    podcast_title,
    headline,
      broadcast_id
  ORDER BY
    zugriffe DESC )
GROUP BY
  publication_date_2,
  podcast_title,
  headline, 
  broadcast_id

ORDER BY zugriffe DESC

WITH broadcastids AS (
    SELECT CAST(broadcast_id.list[0][0] AS STRING) AS broadcast_id, podcast_title
    FROM Piano.podcast_profiles
    WHERE branding = "$Bereich" 
    AND CASE """$Podcast"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN TRUE
ELSE CAST(broadcast_id.list[0][0] AS STRING) = "$broadcast_id_branding" END
    ORDER BY broadcast_id DESC
),
all_titles_platforms AS(SELECT 
podcast_title as Title,
1 as join_key,
sum(m_zugriffe_1) as zugriffe,
platform
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f_mapped` as podcast_platform
INNER JOIN broadcastids ON podcast_platform.broadcast_id = broadcastids.broadcast_id
WHERE date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY platform, podcast_title),
technische_nutzer_summe AS(
  SELECT podcast_title as Title,
  1 as join_key,
  sum(m_technische_nutzer) as technische_nutzer
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE branding = "$Bereich"
AND CASE """$Podcast"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN True
ELSE podcast_title = """$Podcast""" END 
AND headline != "All headlines"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
GROUP BY podcast_title),
main_data AS(
SELECT Title, join_key, sum(zugriffe) as zugriffe
FROM all_titles_platforms
GROUP BY Title, join_key),
ard_data AS (
  SELECT Title, zugriffe, join_key FROM 
  all_titles_platforms
  WHERE platform = "ARD Audiothek"
),
apple_data AS
(
    SELECT Title, zugriffe, join_key FROM 
  all_titles_platforms
  WHERE platform = "Apple Podcasts"
),
spotify_data AS
(
  SELECT Title, zugriffe, join_key FROM 
  all_titles_platforms
  WHERE platform = "Spotify"
)
SELECT
  main_data.Title, 
  main_data.zugriffe,
  technische_nutzer_summe.technische_nutzer, 
  ard_data.zugriffe as ard_summe, 
  apple_data.zugriffe as apple_summe, 
  spotify_data.zugriffe as spotify_summe
FROM main_data
LEFT JOIN ard_data ON (main_data.join_key = ard_data.join_key AND main_data.Title = ard_data.Title)
LEFT JOIN apple_data ON (main_data.join_key = apple_data.join_key AND main_data.Title = apple_data.Title)
LEFT JOIN spotify_data ON (main_data.join_key = spotify_data.join_key AND main_data.Title = spotify_data.Title)
LEFT JOIN technische_nutzer_summe on (main_data.join_key = technische_nutzer_summe.join_key AND main_data.Title = technische_nutzer_summe.Title)
ORDER BY main_data.zugriffe DESC

SELECT 
  sum(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, platform
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f`
WHERE --profileId = $profileID 
--AND 
--branding = "$Bereich" 
 broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
--AND platform = "ARD Audiothek"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
group by platform

SELECT 
  sum(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, platform
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f`
WHERE --profileId = $profileID 
--AND 
--branding = "$Bereich" 
 broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
--AND platform = "ARD Audiothek"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
group by platform

SELECT 
  sum(m_zugriffe_1) AS summe, platform
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f`
WHERE --profileId = $profileID 
--AND 
--branding = "$Bereich" 
 broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
--AND platform = "ARD Audiothek"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
group by platform

SELECT 
broadcast_id,
user_agent,
platform,
m_zugriffe_1,
date, tmstp
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_platform_daily_f`
--WHERE branding = "$Bereich" 
--AND podcast_title = "$Podcast"
--AND headline ="$Episode"
WHERE date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
ORDER BY m_zugriffe_1 DESC
LIMIT  100
SELECT * FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_spotify_podcasts` LIMIT 50
SELECT * FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_spotify_podcasts_platform` LIMIT 50

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
CASE MAX(tmstp)
  WHEN NULL THEN "N/A"
  ELSE  FORMAT_DATETIME("%d.%m.%Y", DATE_SUB((TIMESTAMP(MAX(tmstp),"Europe/Berlin")), INTERVAL 5 day))
  --ELSE FORMAT_DATETIME("%d.%m.%Y", (TIMESTAMP(MAX(tmstp),"Europe/Berlin")))
  END
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f`
WHERE date > DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 10 day)
AND broadcast_id = "${broadcast_id_branding}"

SELECT 
CASE 
  WHEN '$Podcast' = 'All titles' 
  THEN '$Bereich – alle Podcastreihen'
  ELSE '$Podcast'
END

SELECT 
    CASE """$AllePodcasts"""
    WHEN "None"
    THEN "True"
    ELSE CAST(""" REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') = "$AllePodcasts" """ as string) 
    END

SELECT CASE """${Podcast}"""
WHEN "All titles" THEN "all_titles_platforms"
ELSE "not_all_titles_platforms" END

SELECT DISTINCT branding, 
FROM   `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.podcast_profiles`
WHERE $AllePodcastsCondition AND LRA = "$LRA"
Order by branding ASC

WITH all_podcasts AS(
  SELECT podcast_title FROM Piano.podcast_profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA"
  AND branding = "$Bereich"
  UNION ALL
  SELECT "All titles" as podcast_title 
)
SELECT podcast_title FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') AS podcast_title, CASE podcast_title WHEN "All titles" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS sort  FROM all_podcasts
WHERE $AllePodcastsCondition
ORDER BY sort,podcast_title DESC
)
ORDER BY SORT, podcast_title ASC

SELECT REPLACE(headline,"'","") FROM(
SELECT DISTINCT headline, CASE headline WHEN "All headlines" THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS sort  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE 
branding = "$Bereich" 
AND REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') = """$Podcast"""
AND date > "2022-01-01"
AND headline != "All headlines"
ORDER BY sort,headline DESC
--ORDER BY podcast_title ASC
)
ORDER BY SORT, headline ASC

SELECT COALESCE(broadcast_id) 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f_mapped`
WHERE 
branding = "$Bereich" 
AND REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') = """$Podcast"""
AND date > "2023-01-01" 
ORDER by broadcast_id DESC
--ORDER BY headline ASC

WITH image AS (
    SELECT url
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_image_url_mapping`
 
    WHERE broadcast_id = "$broadcast_id_branding"
)
SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 AND "$LRA" = "NDR" THEN '$NDR_default_image'
        WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 AND "$LRA" = "MDR" THEN '$MDR_default_image'
        ELSE MAX(url)
    END AS url
FROM image;

SELECT  
  CASE 
    WHEN (DATE_DIFF(DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin"), DAY) + 1) < 7 THEN "bar"
    ELSE "line"
  END;

SELECT 
CASE MAX(tmstp)
  WHEN NULL THEN "N/A"
  ELSE FORMAT_DATETIME("%d.%m.%Y | %H:%M Uhr", (TIMESTAMP(MAX(tmstp),"Europe/Berlin")))
  END
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.NDR_podcast_episode_daily_f`
WHERE date > DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 10 day)
AND broadcast_id = "${broadcast_id_branding}"

SELECT CASE "$Podcast"
WHEN "All titles" THEN ""
ELSE "_mapped" END

list.description: Verwenden Sie das Dropdown-Menü "AllePodcasts". In diesem Menü finden Sie alle von uns geführten Podcasts. Soll diese Option nicht verwendet werden, muss der Wert auf "None" gesetzt werden.
list.label: Podcastsuche
list.name: AllePodcasts

query.rawSql:
SELECT podcast_title FROM(
(SELECT DISTINCT REPLACE(podcast_title,'"','') AS podcast_title,  1 AS sort  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.podcast_profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY sort,podcast_title DESC
)
UNION ALL (SELECT "None", -1 as sort)
)
ORDER BY SORT, podcast_title ASC
